name: Wetland Patch Density
functionStatement: Wetlands and storage features store floodwater, recharge groundwater, sustain baseflow, and provide low-velocity habitat.
descriptionMarkdown: Observed wetland patch density divided by expected/reference (O/E). Values near 1 are best.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Count wetland polygons within floodplain; compute patches per kmï¿½ (or per km valley); divide by expected/reference.

inputs.label: Wetland Patch Density
inputs.helpMarkdown: NWI polygons within floodplain + reference reach/region comparison.

references: regional wetland reference summaries where available.
